channel.title: TLA+ on Nothing to see here

item.title: TLA+ Video Course
item.description:
TLA+ Video Course

Abstract

This is a series of video lectures to teach programmers and software engineers how to write their own TLA+ specifications. It assumes a basic understanding of programming concepts. Some knowledge of elementary mathematics, such as might be taught in a beginning university math course for computer scientists, would also be helpful.

Source

HN
